name: Off-Planet
description:
In this game you will be playing an operator of a Forward Operating Base or F.O.B. for short. It is your job to fill this F.O.B. with resources as fast as possible. You will require several machines in order to speed up this process.

Controls:

'WASD' is used for movement.
'Right mouse button' is used for harvesting resources by hand.
'C' is used to open your inventory and crafting menu.
'Escape' is used to open the pause menu.

Good luck operator.
